repairedDockerfile:
#FROM base
#RUN apt-get update

FROM scipy
RUN apt-get -y --no-install-recommends install r-base && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir rpy2
RUN apt-get -y --no-install-recommends install libcurl4-openssl-dev && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
#setup R configs
RUN echo "r <- getOption('repos'); r['CRAN'] <- 'http://cran.us.r-project.org'; options(repos = r);" > ~/.Rprofile
RUN Rscript -e "install.packages('yhatr')"
RUN Rscript -e "install.packages('ggplot2')"
RUN Rscript -e "install.packages('plyr')"
RUN Rscript -e "install.packages('reshape2')"
RUN Rscript -e "install.packages('forecast')"
RUN Rscript -e "install.packages('stringr')"
RUN Rscript -e "install.packages('lubridate')"
RUN Rscript -e "install.packages('randomForest')"
RUN Rscript -e "install.packages('rpart')"
RUN Rscript -e "install.packages('e1071')"
RUN Rscript -e "install.packages('kknn')"
